text: Hunter Sienna McGrady (born May 4, 1993) is an American plus-size model. ==Early life== McGrady was born in Los Angeles, to American actor Michael McGrady and model Brynja McGrady. She has a sister named Michaela. == Career == McGrady started her career as a straight sized model at age 15. At 19, she decided to start plus size modeling because she could not maintain the 00 standard set by her agency. In 2017, she became the largest model (size 16) to appear in a Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. In 2019, she was the first plus-size model on a cover of The Knot. ==References== Category:Female models from California Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Plus-size models Category:People from Tarzana, Los Angeles Category:1993 births Category:Living people
title: Hunter McGrady
